title: Wheels Manufacturing Machines a Rainbow of Seatpost Collars in the USA
content:
Simple and secure, Wheels Manufacturing crafted new CNC-machined alloy Seatpost Collars to make sure your saddle stays put, no matter how rough the terrain you ride. This little trinket is a surprising mix of high-quality, light weight, and US-made affordability. So, can add a dash of color to make your bike pop, and lock down your rigid or dropper seatpost in style.

Wheels Mfg. Seatpost Collars are CNC-machined in the US

Last week Wheels Manufacturing may have lured us in with the hope of joining their elusive Random Derailleur Hanger of the Month Club, but this week, they have more practical machined aluminum goodies for us. Of course, from a more practical derailleur standpoint, Wheels Mfg. does also machine their own colorful all-aluminum UDHs and even Shimano Direct Mount hangers for UDH-equipped road, gravel & mountain bikes. Back to the seatpost collars though…

I’ve had both ultralight and super-budget clamps fail on me in the past, so this is one place I never want to skimp on strength and durability. And these new Wheels Manufacturing Seatpost Collars look like they deliver on lightweight, affordability, and a robust design.

They describe them as an ideal blend of “simplicity, style, and rock-solid performance“. There’s not much I can add to that other than that I am surprised that Wheels Mfg. manages to machine these in the US, offer them in three sizes to fit most conventional seattubes at weights from just 31g, and offer them in a rainbow of 7 bright colors for just $25.

If you have an external seatpost collar that you aren’t 100% satisfied with, or you just want to splash a little color onto your bike, these seem like a no-brainer.

Tech details, pricing & availability

  • 6061 aluminum CNC-machined in the USA
  • features a stainless steel barrel nut and bolt for secure clamping
  • comes in 28.6mm, 31.8mm, and 34.9mm to fit most modern round seattubes
  • available in 7 anodized colors – Black, Red, Orange, Teal, Blue, Purple & Green
  • claimed weight from 31g

Pick up a Wheels Manufacturing Seatpost Collar now for just $25 to add a splash of your favorite color to your bike. Or combine it with some other anodized Wheels Mfg. components like a bottom bracket, headset spacers & cap, or a UDH for color-coordinated accents from tip to tail.

Befuddled by so many seatpost sizes?

Most modern bikes with round seatposts have settled on just a handful of common sizes – you’re mostly safe with 27.2, 30.9, 31.6 & 34.9, these days. But if you need to figure out the seatpost size on several bikes, it can be a little tricky. So Wheels Manufacturing also made this simple, low-cost seatpost size gauge – for pro and DIY home bike mechanics. For just $10, you drop this acrylic jobber into the seattube and you’ll know exactly what seatpost you need – 24 common sizes from 25.0mm all the way up to 34.9mm.

Get yours either directly from Wheels Mfg. or your local bike shop now.
